alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 2:35AM MST until February 07 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM MST MONDAY MAINLY FOR AREAS SOUTH OF PRESCOTT AND DOWNWIND OF THE BRADSHAW MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Northeast winds of 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Yavapai County Mountains...especially areas south of Prescott and downwind of the Bradshaw Mountains. * WHEN...Advisory criteria winds are likely for a few hours this morning into the afternoon and then again after sunset today into the pre-dawn hours on Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
